ca.riskgamet31.maincomps

Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.riskgamet31.maincomps.Country

  • public class Country
extends java.util.Observable
    An entity representing a country To be used for the Graph node data every country will create and register a view Observable model is used.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Fareed Tayar
